testcase.classname: Demonstration of content when elements (e.g., checkbox, input field, etc.) are changed asynchronously.
testcase.name: Remove/Add - Elements (e.g., checkbox, input field, etc.) are changed asynchronously
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the website home page....................................passed When user clicks on dynamic controls........................................passed Then user tick the checkbox and clicks on remove button.....................passed And wait for loading counter................................................passed And Add button is displayed with "It's done" message........................passed And clicks on the Add button................................................passed And Remove button is displayed with "It's back" message.....................passed

testcase.classname: Demonstration of content when elements (e.g., checkbox, input field, etc.) are changed asynchronously.
testcase.name: Enable/Disable - Elements (e.g., checkbox, input field, etc.) are changed asynchronously
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the website home page....................................passed When user clicks on dynamic controls........................................passed Then user clicks on enable button...........................................passed And wait for loading counter................................................passed And message "It's enabled!" will be displayed...............................passed And enter text in the text box and click on Disable again...................passed And user clicks on Disable button...........................................passed And message "It's disabled!" will be displayed..............................passed And check to see text box is editable.......................................passed
